Desc_zh: 缎质V领上衣，上部有蕾丝饰边，配特细肩带。无衬里。
Desc_en: V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Desc_zh: 缎质V领上衣，上部有蕾丝饰边，配特细肩带。无衬里。
Desc_en: V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Desc_zh: 透气雪纺无袖连衣长裙，上身打褶，颈后开口配一粒纽扣。腰部接缝饰短褶边，两侧有装饰细绑带，打褶垂坠裙摆。有衬里。
Desc_en: Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.

Desc_zh: V领短袖围裹式上衣，柔软粘纤汗布面料，上部配钩扣，腰部有接缝和细松紧带，一侧配绑带。
Desc_en: Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.

Desc_zh: V领短袖围裹式上衣，柔软粘纤汗布面料，上部配钩扣，腰部有接缝和细松紧带，一侧配绑带。
Desc_en: Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.

Desc_zh: V领短袖围裹式上衣，柔软粘纤汗布面料，上部配钩扣，腰部有接缝和细松紧带，一侧配绑带。
Desc_en: Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.

Desc_en: V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.

Desc_zh: 略修身双排扣外套，纹理感梭织面料，缺角翻领设计，附翻盖嵌线前袋，袖口配装饰纽扣。有衬里。
Desc_en: Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Desc_zh: 弹力棉质梭织衬衫，经典纽扣前襟，背部抵肩打褶设计，长袖袖口配纽扣，弧形下摆。
Desc_en: Shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a classic button front, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Desc_zh: 水洗做旧牛仔有领外套，正面及袖口配纽扣，附翻盖纽扣胸袋及侧袋，背部有可调搭袢和纽扣。
Desc_en: Jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the back.
